name: R5-Appointment-R4-Appointment
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Appointment into FHIR R4

element.display: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)

target.display: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)
target.comment: R5 `Appointment` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment`

element.display: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Appointment
The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

target.display: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.appointmentType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.appointmentType`

element.display: The request this appointment is allocated to assess

target.display: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.basedOn` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.basedOn` - basedOn has change due to type change: R5 `basedOn` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `basedOn`

element.display: When the appointment was cancelled
The coded reason for the appointment being cancelled
Classification when becoming an encounter
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.contained`

element.display: The date that this appointment was initially created

target.display: The date that this appointment was initially created
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.created` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.created`

element.display: Shown on a subject line in a meeting request, or appointment list

target.display: Shown on a subject line in a meeting request, or appointment list
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.description`

element.display: When appointment is to conclude

target.display: When appointment is to conclude
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.end` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.end`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.id`

element.display: External Ids for this item

target.display: External Ids for this item
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Appointment.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.meta`

element.display: Can be less than start/end (e.g. estimate)

target.display: Can be less than start/end (e.g. estimate)
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.minutesDuration` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.minutesDuration`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Additional comments
Indicates that this appointment varies from a recurrence pattern
The originating appointment in a recurring set of appointments
Participants involved in appointment

target.display: Participants involved in appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.participant`

element.display: The individual, device, location, or service participating in the appointment

target.display: Person, Location/HealthcareService or Device
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.actor` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.participant.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R5 `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `actor`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.participant.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.participant.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.participant.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Participation period of the actor

target.display: Participation period of the actor
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.participant.period`

element.display: The participant is required to attend (optional when false)

target.display: required | optional | information-only
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.required` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Appointment.participant.required` - required added a required binding to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participantrequired|4.0.1; required has change due to type change: R5 required boolean has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 required

element.display: accepted | declined | tentative | needs-action

target.display: accepted | declined | tentative | needs-action
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.participant.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Role of participant in the appointment

target.display: Role of participant in the appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.participant.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.participant.type`

element.display: Detailed information and instructions for the patient

target.display: Detailed information and instructions for the patient
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.patientInstruction` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Appointment.patientInstruction` - patientInstruction changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); patientInstruction has change due to type change: R5 patientInstruction CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 patientInstruction

element.display: The previous appointment in a series
Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize

target.display: Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.priority` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Appointment.priority` - priority removed a binding requirement - Example http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActPriority; priority has change due to type change: R5 priority CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 priority

element.display: Reason this appointment is scheduled
The sequence number in the recurrence
Details of the recurrence pattern/template used to generate occurrences
Any dates that should be excluded from the series
Any recurrence IDs that should be excluded from the recurrence
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The date when the recurrence should end
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Information about monthly recurring appointments
Recurs on a specific day of the month
Indicates which day of the week the appointment should occur
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Recurs every nth month
Indicates which week of the month the appointment should occur
The number of planned occurrences
Specific dates for a recurring set of appointments (no template)
The frequency of the recurrence
The timezone of the occurrences
Information about weekly recurring appointments
Additional content defined by implementations
Recurs on Friday
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Recurs on Mondays
Recurs on Saturday
Recurs on Sunday
Recurs on Thursday
Recurs on Tuesday
Recurs on Wednesday
Recurs every nth week
Information about yearly recurring appointments
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Recurs every nth year
Appointment replaced by this Appointment
Potential date/time interval(s) requested to allocate the appointment within

target.display: Potential date/time interval(s) requested to allocate the appointment within
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.requestedPeriod` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.requestedPeriod`

element.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

target.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.serviceCategory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.serviceCategory`

element.display: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment

target.display: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.serviceType` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Appointment.serviceType` - serviceType has change due to type change: R5 serviceType CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 serviceType

element.display: The slots that this appointment is filling

target.display: The slots that this appointment is filling
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.slot` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.slot`

element.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

target.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.specialty`

element.display: When appointment is to take place

target.display: When appointment is to take place
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.start` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.start`

element.display: proposed | pending | booked | arrived | fulfilled | cancelled | noshow | entered-in-error | checked-in | waitlist

target.display: proposed | pending | booked | arrived | fulfilled | cancelled | noshow | entered-in-error | checked-in | waitlist
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentstatus|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentstatus|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: The patient or group associated with the appointment
Additional information to support the appointment

target.display: Additional information to support the appointment
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Appointment.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Appointment.text`

element.display: Connection details of a virtual service (e.g. conference call)
